submit.queue_commands module¶

submit.queue_commands.clear_submission_list()[source]¶

Clear all entries from the submission list at $MAST_CONTROL/submitlist

submit.queue_commands.direct_shell_command()[source]¶
submit.queue_commands.extract_submitted_jobid(string)[source]¶

Extract the job ID from a string returned when the job is submitted INPUTS:

string <str> = string with job ID somewhere in it
OUTPUTS:
<int> = job ID as integer
submit.queue_commands.print_submitted_dict(submitted)[source]¶

Print a dictionary of all runs submitted into $MAST_CONTROL/submitted Args:

submitted <dict>: Dictionary of submitted runs,
with key as the directory name.
submit.queue_commands.queue_snap_command()[source]¶

Return the command for producing a queue snapshot. INPUTS:

None
OUTPUTS:
Command for producing a queue snapshot
submit.queue_commands.queue_status_from_text(jobid, queuetext)[source]¶

Returns the queue status from a line with the job ID information INPUTS:

jobid <int> = job ID qstr <str> = queue snapshot line containing job ID
OUTPUTS:
<str> = queue status ‘E’: Error ‘X’: Not found ‘R’: Running ‘W’: Waiting
submit.queue_commands.queue_submission_command()[source]¶
submit.queue_commands.submit_from_submission_list()[source]¶

Submit all entries from the submission list at $MAST_CONTROL/submitlist

submit.queue_commands.write_to_submit_list(mydir)[source]¶

Write an entry to the submission list in $MAST_CONTROL/submitlist Args:

mydir <str>: Directory which includes submission
script submit.sh for a single calculation to be submitted to the queue
